body:
Features and Enhancements

Recruitment
  • Select source networks in Recruitment tile
    • Users now have the ability to select a network the provider is in, not just a network the provider is not in.
Provider List export
  • [Provider List CSV Export] Separate entries in the fields with concatenated values
    • If the following fields contain multiple values, they will comma separated.: Client IDs, Degrees, Group Names, Tax IDs, Provider Tags, Provider Location Tags.

Issues Fixed

User Management
  • Fixed an issue where project assignment is not saved when a default specialty mapping is not found.
Network Modeling
  • Fixed an issue where project dropdown was not updated when user changed between regular and modeling modes
Population Files
  • Improve handling of invalid Excel files
  • Update verbiage on population file modal to include PHI disclaimer and link to Help page.

Technical Updates

React
  • Updated Header and Settings to React.
  • This is transparent to the user.
